title: Notebook: Inside Visma’s Mad Tour de France Scramble, Jorgenson’s Big GC Chance, Quinn’s Funky US Jersey
content:
Tour de Hoody: Will they or won't they start? Visma-Lease a Bike is on egg shells if Jonas Vingegaard or Wout van Aert will be ready to race the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Notebook: Inside Visma’s Mad Tour de France Scramble, Jorgenson’s Big GC Chance, Quinn’s Funky US Jersey on Velo.
author: ahood
